title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: All questions you have about Nuxt Content

questions.label: How does Nuxt Content work?
questions.content: Nuxt Content uses a file-based approach to content management, allowing developers to create and edit content in Markdown, JSON, or other structured formats. It then provides a query engine to fetch and display content dynamically in Nuxt applications.

questions.label: Does Nuxt Content support SEO?
questions.content: Yes, Nuxt Content is optimized for SEO. It allows you to set meta tags, descriptions, and structured data for better indexing by search engines.
